entry.title: New release for Kubetail: cli/v0.2.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Console source picker bug fix by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/182

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/compare/cli/v0.2.1...cli/v0.2.2

entry.title: New release for Kubetail: cli/v0.3.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Dashboard enhancement. by @victorchrollo14 in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/193
  • fix: refactor homepage. by @victorchrollo14 in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/198

New Contributors

  • @victorchrollo14 made their first contribution in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/193

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/compare/cli/v0.2.3...cli/v0.3.1

entry.title: New release for Kubetail: cli/v0.3.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Bump golang.org/x/net from 0.37.0 to 0.38.0 in /modules/dashboard by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/199
  • Bump golang.org/x/net from 0.37.0 to 0.38.0 in /modules/cli by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/201
  • Bump golang.org/x/net from 0.37.0 to 0.38.0 in /modules/cluster-api by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/202
  • Security update golang.org/x/net => 0.38.0 by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/203
  • sec: upgraded helm.sh/helm/v3 => 3.17.3 by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/204
  • Upgrade pnpm dependencies by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/205
  • fix: added the missing kubeContext arg into the useWorkloadCounter hook. by @victorchrollo14 in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/206
  • Add border to collapsed console sidebar by @HarshDeep61034 in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/209
  • feat: More improvements in the dashboard. by @victorchrollo14 in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/207

ðŸ¥³ First contribution from @HarshDeep61034

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/compare/cli/v0.3.1...cli/v0.3.2

entry.title: New release for Kubetail: cli/v0.3.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: add oidc plugin for k8s client by @SoulKyu in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/212
  • Update README.md by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/213
  • Update README.md by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/214

New Contributors

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/compare/cli/v0.3.2...cli/v0.3.3
